description: Demolition of existing rear conservatory and erection of part two storey/part single storey rear extension
decision_conditions: The submitted proposed plans and elevations do not accurately represent the proposed depth of the single storey rear extension and indicate changes to the width of the existing rear dormer roof extension that was not included within the proposal. Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the character and appearance of the property or the wider area and on the residential amenities of neighbouring properties. The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of accurate and consistent drawings, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact on the residential amenities of adjoining neighbouring properties, or the character and appearance of the existing property or the wider area, in conflict with the Paragraph 124 of the NPPF (2023), Policies D3 of the London Plan (2021) and DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).
